name: IRCCloud Nick-clrs.cc Palette
description:
A nicer color palette for nick colouring that fits darker themes. Based on http://clrs.cc/
Can be used with style 97736
Includes option to colourize memberlist.
additional_info: Colour memberlist: no: default behaviour, only colours nicknames in memberlist on hover. yes: instantly colour all nicknames in memberlist regardless of hover.

style_setting_options.label: no
yes
